    keyID := flag.String("k", "", "The ID of a KMS key")
    text := flag.String("t", "", "The text to encrypt")
    flag.Parse()

    if *keyID == "" || *text == "" {
        fmt.Println("You must supply the ID of a KMS key and some text")
        fmt.Println("-k KEY-ID -t \"text\"")
        return
    }
